name: The Great Paper Adventure
description:
The Great Paper Adventure is a funny papered 2D shoot-them-up made with XNA.

It was released on PC during Decembre 2010 and on Xbox during June 2011.

  • Source code (no assets)
  • OST

Made by:

  • Valryon (Damien Mayance): Project leader, main developer
  • Lapinou (Thibault Person): 2D "Graphist", developer

Special thanks to:

  • Ashen (Matthieu Oger): Website developper
  • Minishlink (Louis Lagrange): additionnal developer
  • Spintronic: chiptune composer
  • Semoule (Anaïs Noblanc): support, tests and cooking
  • Yaki (Gabriel Corbel): tests
  • Aymarick (Aymeric De Abreu): iOS version (aborted) developer
